title: Romeo Beckham's 'girlfriend' Mia 'Mimi' Moocher models for PrettyLittleThing in playful snaps
text:
She's sparked romance rumours with Romeo Beckham.

And Mia 'Mimi' Moocher showed off her modelling talents in a series of fun photos for the fashion brand PrettyLittleThing on Wednesday.

Mia dressed in a crop top and jeans for the playful shoot, sticking out her tongue for the camera.

Say cheese: Romeo Beckham's rumoured girlfriend Mia 'Mimi' Moocher has showed off her modelling talents in a series of fun photos for the fashion brand PrettyLittleThing

She accessorised with on-trend bucket hat in a cow-print, adding to the nineties vibe of the look.

Mia and Romeo sparked romance rumours earlier this year when the model joined him at a private family dinner in celebration of his mother Victoria Beckham's fashion show.

The pair enjoyed another day out together earlier this month when they visited one of London's Tate galleries.

Fun shoot: Mia dressed in a crop top and jeans for the playful shoot, sticking out her tongue for the camera

Retro style: She accessorised with on-trend bucket hat in a cow-print, adding to the nineties vibe of the look

The 17-year-old son of David and Victoria Beckham appeared on Mia's Instagram stories as he put on a casually cool display in a dove grey hoodie, silver chain and cross body bag.

Romeo also posted snaps of his day of cultural fun, but did not share any photos of Mia.

One showed him in the a smoky room, while he also posed up with rays of coloured light on his face.

Last month Romeo and Mia were pictured arriving together for Victoria's dinner at Harry's Bar in Mayfair.

Just friends? Romeo enjoyed another day out with rumoured new girlfriend Mia earlier this month as the pair visited one of London's Tate galleries

Last month: They sparked romance rumours earlier this year when Mia joined him at a private family dinner in celebration of his mother Victoria Beckham's fashion show

Outing: The 17-year-old son of David and Victoria Beckham appeared on Mia's Instagram stories as he put on a casually cool display in a dove grey hoodie

Romeo was pictured wearing a light blue shirt and striped trousers with box fresh white trainers after sitting in the FROW with the rest of his famous family.

And Mimi shared a video of the catwalk from inside the show on her Instagram stories soon after attending.

She also shared a picture of Romeo on her Instagram on his birthday on September 1, writing: 'Haps smiley bday Romo' alongside a heart emoji.

Several of her pals commented, writing things like: 'you guys are the cutest!!' and 'u2 are so [heart].'

Mimi is followed by both Cruz, 14, and Romeo and it's not known how long they have known one another.
description: Mia dressed in a crop top and jeans for the playful shoot, sticking out her tongue for the camera.
